message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it worth the investment. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $8,000 for the product. Let me know if this is something you can consider.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not quite there yet. How about we split the difference and settle on $9,000? This would be a fair deal for both of us, and I think we can still make this work.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I understand your position, but I'm still unable to meet the price of $9,000. I'm willing to go up to $8,500 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
